page.title: 12FARMHOUSE HOLIDAYS, ST.ALLEN
page.content: Mr.& Mrs.Keast at Burnetts(18 acres) keep a few sheep,store-cattle,hens & ducks.Burnetts is attractive,well- placed for tourists,6 miles from St. Agnes & Perranporth,& 3 miles from Truro.Mrs.Keast does bed & breakfast at Â£6.50 a night each,from May to September.Accommodation is in 3 double bedrooms;single beds are available. Breakfast consists: grapefruit, cereal or fruitjuice,followed by a selection from fried bacon,sausages, egg,tomato fried bread,fried potato, with bread, toast,butter & marmalade,& tea/coffee. Brittany Ferries holidays use Burnetts so there are often French guests;most speak some English.Some guests come from a Tourist Board office in Truro; many are regulars:a family from Liver- pool came for 24th year this summer. Treworgan's old farmhouse with court- yard is popular with foreign tourists.
